trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus"></xref> Web server control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece suporte de tempo de design em um designer visual para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus"> </xref> controle de servidor Web.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> control renders a button that automatically checks the authentication status of the user and displays the appropriate login or logout option.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>controle apresenta um botão que automaticamente verifica o status de autenticação do usuário e exibe a opção apropriada de logon ou logoff.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Em um designer visual, quando você alternar de origem para o modo de Design, o código-fonte marcação que descreve o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>controle é analisado e uma versão de tempo de design do controle é criada na superfície de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>

trans-unit.source: When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Quando você alternar de volta à exibição da fonte, o controle de tempo de design é persistente para o código-fonte marcação e editado na marcação da página da Web.

trans-unit.source: The LoginStatusDesigner class provides design-time support for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> control.
trans-unit.target: A classe LoginStatusDesigner fornece suporte de tempo de design para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property returns a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.ActionLists%2A>propriedade retorna um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>objeto, que normalmente contém um objeto que é derivado do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>classe para cada nível na árvore de herança do designer.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.ActionLists%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property always returns `true`, indicating that the designer creates a temporary copy of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> to generate the design-time markup, since the user authentication status is not available at design time.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>propriedade sempre retorna `true`, indicando que o designer cria uma cópia temporária do associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>para gerar a marcação de tempo de design, porque o status de autenticação de usuário não está disponível em tempo de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method returns the markup that is used to render the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> at design time.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>método retorna a marcação que é usada para renderizar associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>em tempo de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.Initialize%2A> method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.Initialize%2A>método prepara o designer para exibir, editar e criar associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.Initialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> control or a copy of that control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework internamente constrói uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner>classe quando ele cria associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>controle ou uma cópia desse controle na superfície de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer action list collection for this designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de lista de ação de designer para este designer.

trans-unit.source: The ActionLists property creates a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> object for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner> class, adds it to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> that is obtained from the ActionLists base property, and then returns the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ActionLists cria um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>de objeto para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner>de classe, adiciona-o para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>que é obtido da propriedade base ActionLists e, em seguida, retorna o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>coleção.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> associated with this designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref> associado a este designer.

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a marcação que é usada para renderizar o controle associado em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LogoutText%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LoginText%2A> property (depending on whether the user is logged in), is `null`, an empty string (""), or a single space (" "), the GetDesignTimeHtml method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LogoutText%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LoginText%2A> property, as appropriate, to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property, enclosed in brackets ("[ ]").
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LogoutText%2A>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LoginText%2A>(dependendo se o usuário estiver conectado), a propriedade é `null`, uma cadeia de caracteres vazia (""), ou um único espaço (""), os conjuntos de método GetDesignTimeHtml a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LogoutText%2A>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LoginText%2A>propriedade, conforme apropriado para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>propriedade, entre colchetes ("[]").</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LoginText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LogoutText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LoginText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LogoutText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Then, regardless of the setting of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LoginText%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LogoutText%2A>, the GetDesignTimeHtml method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> base method to generate the markup for the design-time rendering of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> control.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, independentemente da configuração do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LoginText%2A>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LogoutText%2A>, as chamadas de método GetDesignTimeHtml o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>base do método para gerar a marcação para o processamento de tempo de design do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LogoutText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LoginText%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string containing the markup used to render the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus"></xref> at design time.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres contendo a marcação usada para renderizar o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus"> </xref> em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Prepara o designer para exibir, editar e criar o controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The visual designer calls the Initialize method when it is ready to use the designer to render the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> control.
trans-unit.target: O designer visual chama o método Initialize quando ele estiver pronto para usar o designer para processar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>

trans-unit.source: The Initialize and its base methods configure properties and set up events that are necessary for the operation of the designer.
trans-unit.target: A inicialização e seus métodos base configurar propriedades e configurar eventos que são necessários para a operação do designer.

trans-unit.source: The `component` parameter is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> control that is associated with this designer or a copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> control.
trans-unit.target: O `component` parâmetro é o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>controle associado este designer ou uma cópia do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus"></xref>, which implements an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus"> </xref>, que implementa um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a temporary copy rather than the actual control that is associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o designer deve usar uma cópia temporária em vez do controle real que está associado com o designer para gerar a marcação de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Because the UsePreviewControl property is always `true`, the designer <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> property returns a copy of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> control to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: Porque a propriedade UsePreviewControl é sempre `true`, o designer <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>propriedade retorna uma cópia do associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>controle para gerar a marcação de tempo de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> property creates the copy by persisting the actual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> control, then parsing the persisted control string.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>propriedade cria a cópia, persistindo real <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>controle, em seguida, analisar a cadeia de caracteres de controle persistente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The copied control does not affect any persistence for the actual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>.
trans-unit.target: O controle copiado não afeta qualquer persistência para <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> real

trans-unit.source: If the UsePreviewControl property has been overridden to return `false`, the designer will use the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> itself to generate the design-time markup, and design-time changes to the control will persist to the page markup source.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade UsePreviewControl foi substituída para retornar `false`, o designer usará associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>para gerar a marcação de tempo de design e alterações em tempo de design para o controle será mantido para a origem de marcação da página.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
